# David Knox â€” davidknox.ai

## About
David Knox is a strategy and technology professional who helps organizations bridge business insight and technological execution. He specializes in thoughtful strategy and technical craft, delivered with quiet precision.

## Expertise
- Business strategy and digital transformation
- AI implementation and agentic workflows
- Tax technology and e-invoicing compliance
- Go-to-market strategy for enterprise software
- Systems thinking and first-principles problem solving

## Professional Background
David Knox has worked with organizations including Avalara, Vertex, Oracle, Sovos, Google, Fat Tire Tours, and Penn Cycle. He operates at the intersection of strategic thinking and emerging technology.

## Content
The site features David's professional portfolio, writing on strategy and technology, and contact information.
